mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, rownum as rn FROM (SELECT num, category, id, title, content, read_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM grb_comment WHERE board_num = b.num) comment_cnt, reg_date, board_file, show FROM grb_board b WHERE show = 1 AND category IN (#{category},2) ORDER BY category DESC, num DESC ) A ) WHERE rn >= #{start} AND rn <= #{end}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM grb_board WHERE category IN (#{category},2)
SELECT m.id, m.name, b.num, b.category, b.title, b.content, b.read_cnt, b.comment_cnt, b.reg_date, b.board_file FROM grb_board b JOIN grb_member m ON b.id = m.id WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grb_board(num, category, id, title, content, read_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, show) VALUES(grb_board_seq.nextval ,#{category}, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, 0, sysdate, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT m.name, c.writer, c.content, c.reg_date FROM grb_comment c JOIN grb_member m ON c.writer = m.id WHERE c.board_num=#{board_num} ORDER BY c.comment_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grb_comment(comment_num, board_num, writer, content, reg_date) VALUES(grb_comment_seq.nextval, #{board_num}, #{writer}, #{content}, sysdate)
